channel.title: Beginner on Get Amongst It!
channel.description: Recent content in Beginner on Get Amongst It!

item.title: Back in the saddle
item.description: It has been a long time since I have been blogging. To be honest, I was off doing other things. Now I am back, ready to share my mistakes with the world in a verbose format. Here is hoping that I learn something new along the way.
